members.member: Safely deletes a driver by handling all dependent records to avoid foreign key constraint violations. /// The ID of the driver to delete. Optional. If provided, reassigns RouteData to this driver instead of setting to null. Optional. ILogger for logging errors. True if deleted, false if not found or error.
